name: Soul Master (demo ver.)
description:
(How to play below)

it is finally here!

Armed with only a gun and a supernatural hability, survive from waves of demons, some of them may give you a reward

Soul master is an arcade score-based game where you need to survive as many waves as possible , your main weapon is a gun but you also have the SHADOW RUN, a supernatural hability which makes you fast and untouchable for some time

enemies can also drop MEDICINES, maxiheal for the heart, soular for the focus and demonafrin for the weak

how to play:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left Mouse button to shoot

Right Mouse button to activate Shadow run

to use medicines just touch them

how long will you survive?
